about_the_game:
What happens if you mix the primordial fears of Alfred Hitchcock with the mind boggling narrative of Christopher Nolans? A thrilling and hair-rising story like PERSEVERA!

Persevera is a modern day psychological thriller of the terrifying nexus between a fanatic scientist with an unhinged notion of motherly love towards her son. In this psychological adventure game you must come to grips with this involuntary purpose of life, in other words: the ever repeating agony meticulously composed just for you, in the remnants of a former research laboratory of the A.K.H. LUT, the “Artificial Kryogenic Hydroculture LUT University, Finland''.

THE WORLD HAS CHANGED
The international operation consisted of spreading freezing agents in our oceans in order to stop the continuous rise of the earth’s temperature. This method might be trivial, but effective. At least for the first decade. Then, first mutations of sea dwellers were recorded and first human infections only shortly afterwards. The infections induced a catastrophic overburdening of the hospitals, which resulted in the highest global mass mortality rate ever recorded.

ABOUT PERSEVERA
In PERSEVERA you take on the role of the main protagonist Edward, who has lost his memory and is now trying to find answers. The main story is driven by two main goals. First, opening the briefcase and secondly, finding out why you woke up wearing a torn medical scrub while being chained to the suitcase in the first place. While you are trying to figure out a way to open the briefcase, you simultaneously explore puzzling circumstances and find out more about the dangers.

  • Explore the research laboratory
  • Experience the unique storyline written by a real author
  • Find out who you are and why you are there
  • Find a solution to open the briefcase
  • Solve riddles to proceed
  • Find a solution to your mental health status

content_descriptors.notes: Persevera is an immersive phsychological thriller experience. It contains scary content which should not be shown to children.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Ryzen 5 3600 or similar
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 2050 or similar
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Ryzen 7 5700X or similar
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 3060 or similar
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: Intoxicated by the philosophy of absurdity of Albert Camus, you wake up malnourished in a torn medical scrub with a suitcase handcuffed to your left arm and thousand open questions. In your pursuit of truth and answers, you encounter various daring quests, technical riddles and hazardous chases.
